Barrage.display_help: You perform a quick punch that deals moderate damage. Coupled with other energy punches, Barrage can Disorient a foe. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Energy_Punch.display_help: You perform a powerful Energy Punch that deals moderate damage. When used with other Energy Melee attacks, Energy Punch can Disorient your opponent. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Bone_Smasher.display_help: A Bone Smasher attack can be slow, but it compensates by dealing a good amount of damage and having a better chance to Disorient than Energy Punch. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Taunt.display_help: Taunts a foe, and some nearby foes, to attack you. Useful for pulling villains off an ally who find themselves in over their head. Taunted foes tend to ignore other Heroes and focus on you for quite a while, so use this power cautiously. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
Your {PowerName} hit, and you Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
messages.display_victim_hit: {Playersource} hit you with their {Powername}. You have been Taunted!

messages.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} partially hit! {PlayerDest} is not taunted but their range is reduced!
messages.display_victim_hit: {Playersource} partially hits you with their Taunt! Your range is reduced but the Taunt is not successful!

Whirling_Hands.display_help: By focusing your energy into the muscles in your arms, you can launch a dizzying flurry of attacks against every foe in melee range. Some foes may be hit hard enough to be Disoriented as well. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Stun.display_help: By focusing your internal energy on your fists, you can turn them into personal tasers. This Stun attack deals minor damage, but has the best chance to Disorient a target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

messages.display_attacker_hit: You tap into your inner strength with your {PowerName} and are more accurate and more deadly for a short while.

Energy_Transfer.display_help: Mastery of Energy Melee begins with the ability to transfer your own Hit Points into a punch that deals extreme damage. Energy Transfer has a good chance of Disorienting the target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Energy_Transfer.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, Self -HP

Total_Focus.display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
